page.title: 05A VILLAGE BUSINESS
page.content: Mrs Lister has lived in the village for 24 years. Before Mr&Mrs Lister moved to the village they lived in Leicester. When they moved out here they both thought it was the end of the world it was fourteen miles from Leicester and neither of them could drive but they would never like to go back to the town now.If she did'nt work she would just like to be a housewife and stay at home.They have an office in the village which sells power tools. They sell the tools to big firms,large factories,shops and engineering factories and to lots of other places as well.They have been in the business for eight years.Before she worked here she worked in a building society,a printing factory in Market Harborough and she also worked at Waltons Land Drainage at Sulby.Mr Lister also teaches tennis.
